column4: hello everybody, remember me. Now I cannot acces NTFS volumes on my system, what's wrong, why only root can do that
it can only be read by root, i want to change it but it says it read only disk, what changes I need in fstab
the wiki might help with that.

if the modem is 56k  and it connects at 14k it is probably a physical problem with the line service or your connections in your home.  possably too much crap connected to the phone line upstream the pc.
